content:
Overview

Quantify the percentage of cells in each cell cycle phase using Calcofluor white stained microscopy images. Processes microscopy images where cell walls/septa are stained with Calcofluor white, segments individual cells, extracts features, and classifies each cell into G1, S, or G2/M phase.

Category

cell_biology
